frame.name: Forgiveness
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Judge</fen> refrains from imposing, or demanding a punishment for an <fen>Evaluee</fen> who has committed an <fen>Offense</fen>. <ex><fex name="Judge">God</fex> <t>forgives</t> <fex name="Evaluee">repentant sinners</fex>.</ex> <ex>Won't <fex name="Judge">you</fex> <t>forgive</t> <fex name="Evaluee">me</fex> <fex name="Offense">for keeping it a secret</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Evaluee
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Evaluee</fen> is subject to the judgment of the <fen>Judge</fen> for having committed the <fen>Offense</fen>. <ex><fex name="Judge">God</fex> <t>forgives</t> <fex name="Evaluee">repentant sinners</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Offense
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Offense</fen> is the illicit or unpleasant act committed by the <fen>Evaluee</fen>. <ex>Won't <fex name="Judge">you</fex> <t>forgive</t> <fex name="Evaluee">me</fex> <fex name="Offense">for keeping it a secret</fex>?</ex></def-root>
